title: Web of Rogues
description: An in browser rogue-like game. Features procedural level generation and a retro-aesthetic UI.

title: efficient.ly
description: An engineering tool and educational site. Enables users to calculate architectural specifications for green building design.

title: Bored? Game!
description: A web based board game simulator. Users can, sign up, log in, and save games.
tech: MongoDB | Express | React | Node.js | Tailwind CSS

title: Needful
description: CRUD application with e-commerce UI. Features user accounts, product reviews, and favorites.
tech: Ruby on Rails | React | Node.js | Tailwind CSS
